Content.Text:
<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
If you don't mind, <MYNAME>, I'd like to ask
you a rather...personal question.
<PAGE>
Are you currently in a relationship with anyone?

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Ah, I see. So you're not presently seeing anyone.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>I apologize for poking my head into your love
life. I do have a reason, though.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>You see, here in this town, we here have a
unique tradition for beginning romantic
relationships.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
When people here wish to start a relationship,
they present their prospective partner with a
handmade ring.
<PAGE>
A <BLUE>Sewing Studio</BLUE> is needed to make one, but the
love and effort put into its crafting is something
its wearer can feel.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Why, I remember when my husband gave me
my ring. I was so happy, I nearly jumped for joy!

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I just wanted to let you know, in case you
perhaps had your eye on someone.
<PAGE>
One day, when you feel a stirring in your heart
for that special someone, don't forget to give
them a ring, okay?
